long_description: Quick and easy to pitch, the Kelty Shade Maker offers instant protection from sun and rain at a price that's hard to beat. Dual hoop poles combine with dual ridge poles to offer ample headroom and wide-open access to the great outdoors. Clip and sleeve construction provides an easy set up; freestanding design is easy to move around once it's set up. Fully weatherproof with taped seams. Guyout points allow you to secure the Kelty Shade Maker in place. Guyline storage pockets keep your place tidy, and keep the guylines always easy to locate. Durable DAC(R) hybrid and wrapped fiberglass poles ensure a sturdy structure. UV-resistant polyester rainfly will not stretch or expand when wet, ensuring a consistently taut pitch.
short_description: Quick and easy to pitch, the Kelty Shade Maker offers instant protection from sun and rain at a price that's hard to beat.
